articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Jo Song Ho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Jo Song Ho
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Jo Song Ho, a general officer of the KPA and a winner of Order of Kim Il Sung, on Thursday, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: More Rallies Held to Denounce UNSC "Resolution on Sanctions"
articles.content:
More Rallies Held to Denounce UNSC "Resolution on Sanctions"
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Provincial rallies were held from June 17 to 20 to denounce the United Nations Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" fabricated at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists.
					 Present there were leading officials of local party and power organs and working people's organizations, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life and youth and students. 
					
					 Speakers vehemently denounced the UNSC for cooking up the said resolution critical of the DPRK on June 12 at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists over its second nuclear test in the name of all the servicepersons of the KPA and people of the DPRK.
					
					 They branded the UNSC's fabrication of the "presidential statement" critical of the DPRK's launch of a satellite for peaceful purposes and its adoption of the above-mentioned "resolution" as illegal brigandish hostile acts of the U.S. and its followers to isolate and stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 The nuclear test conducted by the DPRK is an entirely just and great action to defend the dignity of the country and sovereignty of the nation and ensure peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world, they said, adding;
					
					 All the servicepersons and people of the DPRK will fight against the U.S. imperialists and their followers to the bitter end and the enemies' tightened "sanctions" and "blockade" would only embolden them to wage a more courageous struggle in defence of the sovereignty of the country. 
					
					 The speakers underlined the need to bring about a new surge in the building of a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the Songun revolutionary leadership of the WPK and resolutely smash the reckless moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to isolate and stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Football Players Return Home
articles.content:
DPRK Football Players Return Home
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Footballers of the DPRK returned home Saturday after being qualified for the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
					 Among those present at the airport to greet the players were Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Jung Rin and other officials concerned.
					
					 Sportspersons congratulated players and coaches on their success, putting garlands around their necks and presenting them with bouquets.
					
					 A lot of Pyongyangites turned out to streets of the city from the entrance to Ryonmot-dong to Changjon Crossroads and enthusiastically welcomed the proud sons of the nation.
					
					 The DPRK Cabinet hosted a banquet for the footballers in Okryu Restaurant on the same day.

articles.title: Palestinian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Palestinian Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy on June 19 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Thae Jong, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, and other officials concerned. 
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Beautiful Landscape of Taehongdan County
articles.content:
Beautiful Landscape of Taehongdan County
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Taehongdan County in northeast area of Ryanggang Province has changed its looks into a socialist fairyland.
					 The county was a remote mountainous area where fire-field peasants and workers of lumber camps lived before the liberation of the country. But today educational, cultural and welfare facilities which will not be inferior to distant future ones and cozy dwelling houses for hundreds of households have been constructed in rows and in peculiar forms.
					
					 In accordance with the new change in potato farming modern potato processing bases and pig farms have been built there.
					
					 With the construction of the Taehongdan Power Station No. 5 and some others the night view of the county town is bewitchingly beautiful for its street lamp light and electricity decorations.
					
					 The parks and places bedecked with colorful electric lights are crowded with young men and women who are taking rest after work.
					
					 The sea of potato-flowers at Taehongdan is worthy of seeing. It is called one of the nine sceneries of Songun in the DPRK.

articles.title: Anti-Imperialist Military Front, Lifeline of Korean Revolution
articles.content:
Anti-Imperialist Military Front, Lifeline of Korean Revolution
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The anti-imperialist military front is the main front, lifeline for the DPRK, on which the life or death of the country, nation and socialism depend.
					It is because the DPRK is a field of the fiercest confrontation between socialism and imperialism and is the forefront of the anti-imperialist struggle on which she stands face to face with the imperialists.
					
					The struggle has been fierce in the past but today the Korean people's struggle for independence and socialism becomes severest as they fight the imperialist allied forces.
					
					The way for defending the country, nation and socialism in the confrontation "who beats who" depends on how to fight on the anti-imperialist military front and a concession and retreat on the front mean giving up socialism and becoming slaves of the imperialists.
					
					Only by winning the victory on the front is it possible to emerge victorious on the political and ideological front and on the economic and scientific front.
					
					The victory on the anti-imperialist military front guarantees the victory on the political and ideological front.
					
					It is imperative to win victory on the anti-imperialist military front for increasing the internal forces of the revolution through the strengthening of the Party, enhancement of the function and role of the people's government in the socialist construction and the realization of the single-minded unity.
					
					Only the strong military power can frustrate any hostile moves of the imperialists and consolidate the political and ideological base of socialism as firm as a rock.
					
					The front of economy and science is a major one to increase the national power and lay the material foundation for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					The imperialists and reactionaries are resorting to every vicious means to restrain the reactivation of the economy and to obstruct scientific and technological development in the DPRK.
					
					The victory on the anti-imperialist military front is a key of making a breach in the imperialists' pernicious economic blockade and developing national economy, science and technology rapidly.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Its Moves to Implement UN "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Its Moves to Implement UN "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Lee Myung Bak, when interviewed by the Wall Street Journal some days ago, cried out for taking "tougher and more effective counteraction", expressing his "support" for the UN "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK and the like. The conservative authorities are busy setting up what they called "all-government consultative body" for the implementation of the UN "resolution on sanctions" and taking "measures" for the same purpose.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed commentary dismisses this as another serious anti-DPRK provocation perpetrated by the wicked sycophants and traitors and war maniacs to harass peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and isolate and stifle fellow countrymen in conspiracy with outsiders.
					
					 The above-said moves of the Lee group are nothing but rash acts of the wicked traitors to the nation, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					  A main aim sought by the U.S. in prodding the UNSC into adopting the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK is to suffocate the economy of the DPRK and stamp out its ideology and bring down its system chosen by its people. The Lee group has rolled up its sleeves to launch the criminal international offensive of pressure in a bid to do harm to the DPRK. Herein lies the gravity of the situation. 
					
					 The DPRK regards national dignity and sovereignty as its life and soul. It is the unshakable mode of counteraction for it to take the toughest measures against the challenges of the hostile forces without making the slightest concession.
					
					 The Lee group had better behave with discretion, well aware of what do the "sanctions" mean. The implementation of "sanctions" precisely means a war. If the group dares try to encroach upon the sovereignty of the DPRK under the signboard of implementing the "resolution on sanctions", the DPRK will deal merciless and just retaliatory blows at the provocateurs and wipe them out to the last man to achieve the historic cause of national reunification as already clarified by it.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Outbursts Rebuked
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Outbursts Rebuked
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak, addressing a meeting commemorating the Memorial Day, blustered that the north is "threatening global peace and stability" and south Korea and cried out for "resolutely and decisively coping with the threat." Earlier, when meeting with a U.S. inter-agency delegation, he let loose a spate of balderdash about "dialogue" and "huge assistance".
					 Commenting on this fact, Minju Joson Saturday brands his remarks as a revelation of the wicked intention to stand in confrontation with the fellow countrymen to the last in conspiracy with outsiders, which can never be allowed.
					
					 It is thanks to the DPRK's powerful war deterrent for self-defense that the aggressors' scheme to ignite the second Korean war has been fully frustrated and peace has been maintained on the Korean Peninsula, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 This deterrent also protects the security of the south Korean people.
					
					 It is none other than the United States and the Lee Myung Bak group kowtowing to it that are posing a threat to the security of the Korean Peninsula and the global peace.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the Lee group of traitors made such reckless remarks as "threat" and "resolute and decisive counteraction" over the DPRK's self-defensive war deterrent. This fully revealed again the bellicose colors of the group engaging itself only in confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 Its assertion for "dialogue" and "huge assistance", too, can never be overlooked.
					
					 The group of traitors pushed the inter-Korean relations, which had been developed favorably since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, into the phase of collapse with neither dialogue nor cooperation and spoiled the process of denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula. Not content with this, it recently solicited the U.S. for "provision of combat force for extended nuclear deterrence" in an attempt to impose nuclear disaster upon the fellow countrymen. So, it is the height of impudence and shamelessness that the group talked about "dialogue" and "huge assistance".
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to apologize to the nation and step down from power, far from foolishly seeking its way out in the confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today dedicates a signed article to the 14th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism".
					 The work comprehensively clarifies all issues arising in victoriously advancing the socialist cause with the might of ideology as required by the developing era and revolution including the essence and contents of the ideological work and the basic duties, principles and ways of conducting it. 
					
					The article goes on: 
					
					 Kim Jong Il has provided great leadership to steer the drive for effecting a great surge to victory with the might of ideology. This finds an expression, first of all, in the facts that he set forth revolutionary slogans and militant policies, giving full play to the revolutionary enthusiasm and creative ingenuity of the Korean people, and saw to it that forms and methods of the ideological work were steadily improved as required by the developing reality. This also finds its manifestation in that he made sure that the ideological work was energetically conducted as the work involving the whole Party and state and society. 
					
					 The slogans "All efforts for the victory in the drive for bringing about a great surge!" and "Let us all become honorable victors in the 150-day campaign!" seen at every site of the campaign for building a great prosperous and powerful nation reflect the unshakable will of Kim Jong Il to conduct an all-out offensive involving the whole Party, a general drive involving the whole state mobilization and an all-people general decisive campaign to usher in an era of the greatest creations and changes in the history of the country.
					
					 While putting up revolutionary slogans arousing all the people to effect a great upswing  Kim Jong Il has elucidated all issues arising in subordinating everything to effecting a great surge and bringing about an unprecedented boost in production including the issue of waging a more dynamic political and ideological offensive to motivate the masses' thought  as required by the developing reality in all fields and the issue of giving full play to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance, the popular heroism and the collectivist spirit.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, all the systems and methods of the ideological work of the WPK have been oriented towards winning victory in the drive for effecting a new great revolutionary surge and the vitality of ideological and educational means including media and literature and arts has been fully demonstrated. 
					
					 Officials should play the role of a blower arousing the mental power of the masses while the party members should play the role of a skilful agitator leading the masses to steer their mindset. This is the noble intention of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The officials and other party members are energetically steering the masses in the drive for building a thriving nation as torch-bearers and vanguard for a new great revolutionary surge, true to the intention of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Puppet Clique's Fascist Suppression of Patriotic Youth Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Clique's Fascist Suppression of Patriotic Youth Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Representatives of youth and students organizations including the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) and civic and public organizations called a joint press conference in Seoul on June 14 denouncing the puppet group for such fascist action as arresting Ri Hui Chol, chairman of the 8th-term Hanchongryon. 
					 A press release read out at the press conference noted that Ri Hui Chol is a righteous patriotic young man who waged an indomitable struggle despite the ceaseless chase and watch by the security authorities. 
					
					 Recalling that the security authorities have kept Ri Hui Chol on the want list for the last 10 years for the mere reason that he is chairman of Hanchongryon and called for democratization of society and finally threw him behind bars, the release said that the security authorities' human rights abuse is touching off the people's resentment. 
					
					 The ever more intensified suppression of people by the security authorities and their acts of arresting protesters and putting them under custody everyday are the products of the moves stepped up by the Lee Myung Bak regime to strengthen the dictatorship aimed at stamping out democracy, the press release pointed out, and continued: 
					
					 The recent campaign of suppression is nothing but a despicable move of the authorities to hold in check the struggle of the youth and students to realize the democratization of society and put an end to their dictatorial policy. 
					
					 It demanded the Lee Myung Bak regime stop at once the moves to stamp out democracy and immediately release the detained patriotic young man.

articles.title: Hanchongryon Calls for Struggle for Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Hanchongryon Calls for Struggle for Independent Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) made public a statement on June 17 on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					 Recalling that great achievements have been made in the work for national reconciliation and cooperation and the reunification movement since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, the statement said: But, no sooner had the Lee Myung Bak regime emerged than it came out with such anti-DPRK, anti-reunification policy of confrontation as "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars," driving the inter-Korean relations into the brink of war.
					
					 What is intolerable is that the "government" and the "Grand National Party" and other pro-U.S. conservative forces opposed to reunification seek to lay the blame for the collapse of the inter-Korean relations at the door of the north.
					
					 It is the Lee Myung Bak bellicose forces that are wholly to blame for the deteriorated inter-Korean relations as they are fully participating in the PSI and hell-bent on the racket for a war of aggression. 
					
					 The statement called on the youth to dedicate sweat and blood to the struggle for eliminating the anti-reunification forces standing in the way of implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and achieving the independent reunification of the country.

articles.title: Firing Exercise Conducted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Firing Exercise Conducted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Units of the ground force of the south Korean puppet army conducted a large-scale exercise of firing artillery pieces in the areas of Cholwon, Kangwon Province and Ryonchon, Kyonggi Province of south Korea on June 18, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The warmongers mobilized large-caliber MLRS and K-9 artillery pieces, getting overheated with the war exercise.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak puppet bellicose forces have ceaselessly conducted war exercises in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line under the simulated condition of invasion of the north, aggravating tension day by day.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' DPRK-Targeted War Exercises Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' DPRK-Targeted War Exercises Blasted
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The warmongers of the south Korean puppet army conducted madcap DPRK-targeted war exercises in June, disturbing peace, according to a military source.
					 Some days ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak kicked up anti-DPRK war hysteria at the puppet air force operation headquarters in Osan in Kyonggi Province and the chiefs of the general staff of the puppet navy and army cried out for modifying "war rules" and rounding off "the readiness to carry out operations" at units of the puppet army.
					
					 Such outbursts let loose by the traitor and warmongers of the puppet military are being directly applied to military operations as evidenced by the recent frantic air and ground joint war exercises staged in the area of Phochon, Kyonggi Province by the puppet air and ground forces under the simulated conditions of attacking the center of the north and occupying certain areas.
					
					 On June 9, 10, 18 and 19 they fired bullets and shells in several areas, fanning up war atmosphere. 
					
					 The puppet navy staged fleet maneuvers in the East Sea of Korea on June 16 and 17.
					
					 Earlier, the puppets deployed guided missile high speed craft in the West Sea of Korea on June 2. They dispatched those craft and other high speed craft on June 15 to let them conduct maritime mobile and ship control exercises.
					
					 In another development, warmongers of the puppet military have held confabs one after another on Paekryong Island and Yonphyong Island for conducting operations simulating the "third skirmish in the waters off Yonphyong Island" after beefing up forces of the puppet marine corps there, fanning up war hysteria. F-15K fighter bombers of the puppet air force to be involved in a West Sea operation are put on alert.
					
					 These military moves of the puppet military are another serious provocation against the DPRK and a deliberate and premeditated move to push the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.

articles.title: UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK Castigated by British Bodies
articles.content:
UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK Castigated by British Bodies
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 13 denouncing the UN Security Council for  adopting a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK at the instigation of the United States.
					 The statement termed the resolution an unpardonable provocation to the DPRK, a legitimate sovereign state and a member state of the UN.
					
					 Noting that the UNSC's adoption of the resolution was aimed to disarm the DPRK and suffocate its economy in a bid to stamp out its ideology and bring down its system, the statement accused the U.S. of abusing the UN for conquering the DPRK through sanctions and pressure and turning it into its neo-colony.
					
					 The above-said resolution of the UNSC can never work on the DPRK as it has a powerful industry based on the Juche idea and self-reliance, the statement noted, adding that it is only the U.S. imperialists who are destined to suffer a shameful defeat.
					
					 The statement called on the friends of the DPRK, the adherents to the Juche idea and Songun idea and world progressive people to extend full support to the Korean people in their confrontation with the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia made public a statement on June 15 in denunciation of the United Nations Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK. 
					 The above-said resolution adopted by the UNSC at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists was a vile product of the U.S.-led offensive of international pressure aimed at disarming the DPRK and undermining the DPRK's ideology and system chosen by its people, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula has reached the phase of the most acute confrontation in history due to the moves of the U.S. and its followers to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nukes was by no means an option wanted by itself but an inevitable option taken by it to cope with the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat. The Korean Peninsula can be nuclear-free only when it is completely free from the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 All the measures taken by the DPRK were prompted by its desire to protect its sovereignty and dignity and ensure peace and security on the peninsula. 
					
					 The UNSC would be well advised to think twice, bearing in mind that the increased pressure on its part would only compel the DPRK to take stronger counter-actions against it, the statement warned.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Celebrated in India
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Celebrated in India
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Meetings, a film show and a book exhibition took place in India on June 7 and 8 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were works of Kim Jong Il, books showing his immortal feats and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Speakers said at the meetings that the past 45 years since he started the work at the WPK Central Committee were the period in which he has performed great feats before the Korean people and progressive humankind with his outstanding political caliber.
					
					 They highly praised Kim Jong Il for having led the revolution and construction to victory with outstanding political philosophy and unique political mode and developed the WPK into a guiding force of the Songun revolution by propounding the original theory of party building. 
					
					 They referred to the fact that since his start of work at the WPK Central Committee, the WPK has further developed into the party of President Kim Il Sung and an ever-victorious invincible party regarding the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and the Juche idea as the only guiding principle. 
					
					 The participants of the film show watched a Korean film showing the invincible might of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Koreans in Uzbekistan Observe Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Koreans in Uzbekistan Observe Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Uzbekistan held an event on June 15 on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Present at the event were Sok Myong Son, chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans, Jo Yun Hae, chairman of the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, and other officials and Koreans in Uzbekistan.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Uzbekistan and staff members of the DPRK embassy were among those present on invitation.
					
					 The full texts of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration were read out and speeches were made at the event. 
					
					 Referring to the great achievements made in the inter-Korean relations and the movement for the reunification of the country after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, the speakers said this is the fruition of the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Noting that the north-south relations made dynamic progress along the road of independent reunification under the banner of the historic June 15 joint declaration but are now facing a grave challenge of the anti-reunification forces, they branded the Lee Myung Bak group as a gang of traitors bringing only misery and tragedy to the nation and an obstacle in the way of improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving reunification.
					
					 All Koreans who love the country and the nation should pool their will and efforts under the banner of "By our nation itself" no matter where they are and no matter what they do and turn out in the drive for the common prosperity and development of the nation, they stressed.
					
					 A performance of Korean artistes there was given.

articles.title: Magazine "Korean Information" Published
articles.content:
Magazine "Korean Information" Published
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association published a magazine "Korean information" on the occasions of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 9th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The magazine edited a photograph of him inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army and articles under various titles.
					
					 The magazine in an article titled "45 years of the great leadership" said that he has developed the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party.
					
					 Kim Jong Il firmly preserved the revolutionary character of the WPK in the 1990s, increasing the nation's defence capacity in every way and protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country and led the "Arduous March," the forced march of the Korean people to victory, bringing about a landmark turn in the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation, the magazine noted.
					
					 The magazine in an article titled "No force can stem the trend of the June 15 era of reunification" said that the adoption of the north-south joint declaration in June 2000 brought the June 15 era of reunification to the Korean Peninsula, the moves of the puppet Lee Myung Bak regime rendered the inter-Korean relations extremely tense and the Korean people have struggled to achieve the country's reunification while foiling the moves of the anti-reunification forces. 
					
					 In an article titled "Chollima of Korea", the magazine recalled that Kim Jong Il visited the Chollima Steel Complex to kindle the torch of a new great revolutionary surge and the Korean people are all out in the 150-day campaign to achieve great successes every day.
					
					 It in articles held that it is the only way for solving the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula for the U.S. administration to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Cambodia
  Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" was brought out in booklet by the Antri Miek Publishing House of Cambodia on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 The work, published on December 25, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the idea that to respect forerunners of the revolution is the requirement of the revolution and the principled issues arising in establishing the moral traits of respecting forerunners of the revolution and developing the relations based on the noble sense of moral obligation among people.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on June 15.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il expresa condolencias por fallecimiento de Jo Song Ho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il expresa condolencias por fallecimiento de Jo Song Ho
  Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el dia 18 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Jo Song Ho, general del EPC laureado con la Orden Kim Il Sung, expresando profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Prosiguen mitines de repudio a la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Prosiguen mitines de repudio a la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC
 Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar del dia 17 al 20 en todas las provincias de Corea los mitines para denunciar la "resolucion de sancion" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU inventada bajo la instigacion de Estados Unidos.
					  En los mitines participaron los funcionarios directivos de las instituciones locales del partido, el Poder y organizaciones de masas, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los trabajadores de distintos estratos, los jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					  En nombre de todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el pueblo, los oradores rechazaron categoricamente al Consejo de Seguridad por haber aprobado el dia 12 a instigacion de los imperialistas norteamericanos la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC pretextando la segunda prueba nuclear de esta.
					
					  Esta "resolucion" antecedida por la "declaracion presidencial", que ha inventado el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU cuestionando el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos, resulta la otra accion hostil e ilegitima de caracter gansteril de EE.UU. y sus satelites para aislar y aplastar a la RPDC, condenaron.
					
					  Nuestra prueba nuclear deviene un evento sumamente justo para defender la dignidad y la soberania de la patria y la nacion y preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo, subrayaron y expresaron la determinacion del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de luchar hasta el final contra los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus satelites.
					
					  Mientras mas brutales se tornen la "sancion" y el "bloqueo" de los enemigos, mas audaz y resuelta sera nuestra lucha por defender la soberania del pais, advirtieron.
					
					  Concluyeron exhortando a registrar un nuevo auge en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera socialista en pleno acato a la direccion sobre la revolucion del Songun (priorizacion militar) del PTC y a frustrar rotundamente las imprudentes maniobras del imperialismo yanqui y sus seguidores tendentes a aislar y aplastar a la RPDC.

articles.title: CRPP condena provocaciones militares de banda de Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRPP condena provocaciones militares de banda de Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ATCC) -- El secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico la vispera la informacion No. 951 denunciando a la camarilla del traidor Lee Myung Bak que en el llamado "acto conmemorativo del incidente del Mar Oeste", que tuvo lugar el dia 15 en la comandancia de la segunda flota del ejercito titere surcoreano, pronuncio sin vacilacion alguna discurso agresivo y belicista como el "aniquilamiento" y el "tercer conflicto armado en el Mar Oeste".
					  Con anterioridad, en la "reunion de los ministros relacionados con la diplomacia y seguridad" el ministro de Defensa Nacional titere se atrevio a hablar de la "reaccion rotunda" a alguien adulando al traidor Lee Myung Bak quien destacaba la necesidad del "fortalecimiento de la disposicion para la guerra" pretextando la inexistente "provocacion del Norte de Corea", precisa la nota y continua:
					
					  Por otra parte, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos agravan mas la tension reforzando en gran medida los buques de guerra como el destructor y el buque rapido con proyectiles teledirigidos y los efectivos en los alrededores de la linea de demarcacion en el Mar Oeste y desarrollando con ellos de manera frenetica los ejercicios practicos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  El Secretariado del CRPP lo condena categoricamente calificandolo de extremadamente peligrosa provocacion militar para desatar a toda costa la guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					  Las provocaciones militares de la banda del traidor Lee muestran claramente que ellas ya entran en la etapa practica dejando de ser una simple locura belicista y un espacio para enganar y manipular la opinion publica surcoreana.
					
					  Desde el principio, la RPDC no considera como su rival siquiera a la camarilla de Lee que no pasa de ser lacayo y carne de canon de EE.UU.
					
					  Pero, si los belicistas surcoreanos se obstinan en la provocacion militar llevando de continuo la situacion al borde de la guerra pese a las  advertencias reiteradas de la RPDC, los castigara rotundamente con el ilimitado e implacable golpe de represalia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia acciones hostiles a RPDC de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia acciones hostiles a RPDC de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ATCC) -- En la reciente entrevista con "Wall Street Journal" de Estados Unidos, Lee Myung Bak dijo que "es necesario tomar las contramedidas mas fuertes y efectivas" expresando su "apoyo" a la "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Por otra parte, las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas andan ajetreadas para instaurar el llamado "organo consultivo pan-gubernamental" y tomar "medidas" con el fin de ejecutar susodicha "resolucion" de la ONU.
					
					  En un comentario individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun califica esa conducta de otro grave acto provocativo anti-RPDC de los abominables vendepatrias serviles a grandes potencias y maniacos de guerra, tendentes a destruir la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y aislar y aplastar a los connacionales en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					  El hecho de que la banda de Lee expresa su "apoyo" a la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC de la ONU y se dedica activamente a su ejecucion, deviene la locura de los peores traidores a la nacion, revela el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					  EE.UU. fabrico la "resolucion de sancion" mencionada movilizando al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU con el objetivo de asfixiar de manera economica a la RPDC y suprimir la idea y el regimen optados por el pueblo coreano.
					
					  Lo mas grave del caso es que la horda de Lee se muestra mas entusiasta que nadie en esa criminal ofensiva de presion internacional para hacer danos a la connacional RPDC.
					
					  Enfrentarse al desafio de las fuerzas hostiles con sobredureza e intransigencia es el invariable modo de respuesta de Corea que considera como su vida la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion.
					
					  Los compinches de Lee deben actuar con prudencia sabiendo bien que la "sancion", mejor dicho, la implementacion de esa "resolucion de sancion" significa la guerra.
					
					  Si ellos se atreven a violar la soberania de la RPDC bajo el pretexto de la ejecucion de la polemica resolucion, la segunda exterminara a los provocadores con el justo e implacable golpe de represalia y cumplira la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria como ya habia aclarado.
